text: "Dream On" is a 1973 debut single by Aerosmith. It is from their debut self- titled studio album. In 1976 it went to number 6 in the United States and number 10 in Canada. It became a classic song on FM radio. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Debut singles Category:Rock ballads Category:Aerosmith songs Category:Anastacia songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Pop ballads
title: Dream On (Aerosmith song)
